_source.title: Kubernetes Infrastructure Dashboard
_source.description: Dashboard monitors the Kubernetes infrastructure related pods and looks at the log for various error messages that could suggest problems related to the underlying infrastructures.

_source.title: Authentication and Authorization Dashboard
_source.description: Dashboard monitors Kafka logs for TopicAuthorization Errors and for its ability to talk to ICP.

_source.title: File System Dashboard
_source.description: Dashboard monitors Kafka and Zookeeper logs for various file related exceptions to determine the health of the underlying file system.

_source.title: Network Dashboard
_source.description: Dashboard monitors Kafka logs for various network related exceptions and also checks kube-dns failures related to ibm-es

_source.title: Kafka Dashboard
_source.description: Dashboard monitors Kafka for errors related to not being unable to talk to the other brokers and trying to sync up with the brokers.

kibanaSavedObjectMeta.searchSourceJSON: {"index":"logstash-*","highlightAll":true,"version":true,"filter":[{"meta":{"index":"logstash-*","negate":false,"disabled":false,"alias":null,"type":"phrase","key":"kubernetes.namespace","value":"es"},"query":{"match":{"kubernetes.namespace":{"query":"es","type":"phrase"}}},"$state":{"store":"appState"}},{"meta":{"index":"logstash-*","negate":false,"disabled":false,"alias":null,"type":"phrase","key":"kubernetes.container_name","value":"kafka"},"query":{"match":{"kubernetes.container_name":{"query":"kafka","type":"phrase"}}},"$state":{"store":"appState"}}],"query":{"query_string":{"query":"kubernetes.container_name: \"kafka\" AND log: \"Failed to read `log header` from file channel\"","analyze_wildcard":true}}}

_source.title: Kafka - Error while loading log dir
Access Controller - unable to check authorization
Kafka - Replication Factor greater than available brokers
